pr_title: Minor cleanups for ES-specifics in core code.

timeline.message: Giving helper class a better name.

timeline.bodyText: While TimeRangeFilterQuery is a much better name than IndexHelper I find that it implies an object that can instantiated instead of a static factory. How about RangeQueryUtil or RangeQueryFactory?
timeline.author: alex-konn

timeline.message: Moving request class to storage module.
Moving ES specifics from `ClusterIT` to subclass.
Giving helper class a better name.
Renaming class in order to indicate it being a factory.
Renaming class in order to indicate it being a factory.
